message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $13,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $13,000 is still a bit lower than what I'm looking for. How about we split the difference and settle on $13,500?  I think this price reflects the value of the product for both of us.
